Text: As always, thanks for another fine season set.

I really appreciate the quick turn around on the request. All days are good when you can D/L and post stuff. I try to only post things that no one else posts, not like some who think that they just have to post their copy of the same files over and over again, which only serves to water down the download pool on any given torrent. Tried some of the private sites but they are so consumed with ratios that they just don't realize that if they all posted at TPB we would all benefit with a lot less wasted bandwidth and wasted time fishing for complements. I upload to share what I have found or created, not to be constantly thanked.
